original_title: Biography: Rick Springfield - Behind the Image
overview: In a time when feathered hair, tightly-suited body, and boyish face were hallmarks of the era, Springfield's hit song "Jesse's Girl" became the anthem of the 1980s. Through concert footage, songs, and the rare photos, become a groupie on the tour of Springfield's life, which chronicles his early days in Australia to his unusual career path; teen idol, TV soap star, serious rocker
title: Biography: Rick Springfield - Behind the Image
